synopsis.text:
Corporation and Tokyo Metropolitan Government present an exciting scientific animation, as part of their Anime Innovation Tokyo initiative, supporting independent animators and small studios.

At a magical school of wizardry, Haley, a thrill-seeking student, spends his days racing with friends on enchanted broomsticks. When their innovative teacher introduces magic goggles capable of measuring an object's speed, a friendly competition ensues. The challenge: determine the swiftest creature in their surroundings.

After Haley outpaces his rival, Peter, the latter proposes a rematch, leading them to venture into the human realm. Equipped with an advanced, yet incomplete, magic broomstick crafted by their teacher, the duo embarks on a high-speed adventure.

What could possibly be the fastest moving object they'll encounter? Join Haley and Peter in their thrilling quest to uncover the answer!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
